articles.title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang makes Barcelona debut in clinical win over Atletico Madrid - European round-up - Sky Sports
articles.description: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang made a winning start to his Barcelona career as his new side beat Atletico Madrid 4-2 to move into La Liga's top four.

articles.author: Heinz Schenk
articles.title: Jake insists it's about adapting but 'common sense' lacking as refs hamper SA's URC drive - News24
articles.description: Local referees' different interpretations are hampering SA teams' efforts to adapt to the stricter outlook of European officials in the United Rugby Championship.

articles.title: French Man Nails 'Kacha Badam' Dance Challenge In Viral Video, People Call It 'Awesome' - India Times
